headline: Just that Line today
description: A minimalist post presenting a visual provocation about power, money, and knowledge. Designed as an open prompt for reader response.
whyItMatters: This post distills a worldview into three bold fragments. It uses silence, symbolism, and stark imagery to spark interpretation rather than provide one.
sourceFragments: KNOWLEDGE HAS A PRICE WORTH THE BLOOD

associatedMedia.description: A triptych poster with bold graphics and warnings: Money is Power. Power is a Trap. Knowledge has a price worth the blood. Uses skulls, mousetraps, and symbols.
